p.codeblock: Future<void> setExternalVideoSource( {required bool enabled, required bool useTexture, ExternalVideoSourceType sourceType = ExternalVideoSourceType.videoFrame, SenderOptions encodedVideoOption = const SenderOptions()});
public abstract int SetExternalVideoSource(bool enabled, bool useTexture, EXTERNAL_VIDEO_SOURCE_TYPE sourceType, SenderOptions encodedVideoOption);

section.p: After calling this method to enable the external video source, you can call to push external video data to the SDK.
After enabling an external video source by calling this method, you can call to push external video data to the SDK.
After calling this method to enable the external video source, you can call to push external video data to the SDK.
After calling this method to enable the external video source, you can call to push external video data to the SDK.
section.note: Dynamic switching of video sources within a channel is not supported. If you have enabled the external video source and joined a channel, to switch to the internal video source, you must leave the channel first, then call this method to disable the external video source, and rejoin the channel.

Switching video sources dynamically within the channel is not supported. If you have enabled an external video source and joined a channel, to switch to an internal video source, you must first leave the channel, then call this method to disable the external video source, and rejoin the channel.

Switching video sources dynamically within a channel is not supported. If you have already called this method to enable an external video source and joined a channel, to switch to an internal video source, you must first leave the channel, then call this method to disable the external video source, and rejoin the channel.

Switching video sources dynamically in the channel is not supported. If you have called this method to enable the external video source and joined a channel, to switch to an internal video source, you must first leave the channel, then call this method to disable the external video source, and rejoin the channel.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You must call this method before joining a channel.
This method must be called before joining a channel.
This method must be called before joining the channel.
You need to call this method before joining the channel.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable the external video source:
: Enable the external video source. The SDK is ready to receive external video frames.
: (Default) Do not enable the external video source.

Whether to use external video frames in Texture format:
: Use external video frames in Texture format.
: Do not use external video frames in Texture format.
Whether the external video frame is encoded. See .
Video encoding options. If sourceType is EncodedVideoFrame, you need to set this parameter. You can [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to learn how to configure this parameter.

Whether to enable the external video source:
: Enable the external video source. The SDK prepares to receive external video frames.
: (default) Do not enable the external video source.

Whether to use external video frames in Texture format:
: Use external video frames in Texture format.
: Do not use external video frames in Texture format.
Whether the external video frame is encoded. See .
Video encoding options. If sourceType is EncodedVideoFrame, this parameter must be set. You can [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to learn how to set this parameter.

Whether to enable the external video source:
: Enable the external video source. The SDK is ready to receive external video frames.
: (Default) Do not enable the external video source.

Whether to use external video frames in Texture format:
: Use Texture format for external video frames.
: Do not use Texture format for external video frames.
Whether the external video frame is encoded. See .
Video encoding options. If sourceType is encodedVideoFrame, this parameter must be set. You can [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to learn how to configure this parameter.

Whether to enable the external video source:
: Enable the external video source. The SDK is ready to receive external video frames.
: (Default) Do not enable the external video source.

Whether to use Texture format for external video frames:
: Use Texture format for external video frames.
: Do not use Texture format for external video frames.
Whether the external video frames are encoded. See .
Video encoding options. If sourceType is ENCODED_VIDEO_FRAME, this parameter must be set. You can [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/) to learn how to set this parameter.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
